[US] RethinkVPS.com - Christmas Deal! | Unmetered! | 1Gb/s VPS
www.RethinkVPS.com 


Hello LowEndTalk! My name is Sam and I am from ReThinkVPS to bring you this great deal for a low end VPS with unmetered bandwidth!


We are offering you this great deal for our VPS 1.0 package which will bring the price down to $6.95 per month.  Our nodes are located on a tier 1 network in Scranton, PA and Los Angeles, CA connected to a fully redundant infrastructure to ensure you can access your VPS at all times!  To get this great discount just use the coupon code "CHRISTMASVPS1" when ordering your VPS 1.0 package.  


All of our nodes are OpenVZ and connected to a 1Gb/s port so you get the speeds you should.  All of the package details are below.


VPS 1.0 Package
Dedicated RAM: 128MB
Burstable RAM: 512MB
Disk Space: 30GB 
Bandwidth: Unmetered!
IP Addresses: 1 (IPv4)
Connection Port: 1Gb/s
Cores: 4 (Shared)
FREE SETUP: $6.95/MONTH (After Coupon)
ORDER NOW: https://billing.rethinkvps.com/cart.php?pid=2

If you have any questions please post them below.

LowEndBox post can be found here:  http://www.lowendbox.com/blog/rethinkvps-6-76-128mb-openvz-vps-with-1gbps-unmetered-in-lascranton/
